description.main_subject: A computer screen displaying a Microsoft Teams meeting and a Notepad document
description.detailed_description: The image captures a digital screen showing an active Microsoft Teams video conference on the right, featuring a participant's face and a list of attendees. On the left, a Notepad application displays academic notes related to convex optimization, with several lines of text highlighted. The overall scene depicts a remote learning or work environment, with clear, bright screen lighting.
